mapper.insert: insert into SEC_WTM (ID, SECTION_ID, SERIAL_NUM, MON_CONTENT, CONTENT_DESC, MON_TYPE, RIVER_NAME, RIVER_LINK, FROM_WDD, SURFACE, VERTICAL, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{monContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riverLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromWdd,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{surface,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{vertical,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update SEC_WTM set SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERIAL_NUM = #{serialNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, MON_CONTENT = #{monContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT_DESC = #{contentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MON_TYPE = #{monType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIVER_NAME = #{riverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIVER_LINK = #{riverLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_WDD = #{fromWdd,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SURFACE = #{surface,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, VERTICAL = #{vertical,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SECTION_ID, SERIAL_NUM, MON_CONTENT, CONTENT_DESC, MON_TYPE, RIVER_NAME, RIVER_LINK, FROM_WDD, SURFACE, VERTICAL, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from SEC_WTM where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, SECTION_ID, SERIAL_NUM, MON_CONTENT, CONTENT_DESC, MON_TYPE, RIVER_NAME, RIVER_LINK, FROM_WDD, SURFACE, VERTICAL, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from SEC_WTM
